pages.text: $(o)Looking up in the night sky, shooting stars seem to fall too close to earth, tumbling into mountains, caught by their spires. An uneasiness fills your gut every time you gaze above and see them tumbling down.

$(o)Something doesn't sit right with the falling celestial bodies tumbling from the heavens. Something more hides in those flaming, glittering fragments as they tumble to earth.$(br2)You pack your things and depart, off to the nearest mountain, prepared for a journey, unsure what you'll discover.

To begin, each entry in this guide will first contain a story element, similar to the Thaumonomicon from Thaumcraft, putting you in the role of a character discovering the components of MineBound and piecing together what they can accomplish.

To begin the mod, search for $(l:minebound:structures/crashed_ship)crashed ship$() structures in mountains or $(l:minebound:structures/ruined_base)ruined base$() structrues underground in the overworld or the nether. Finding and breaking $(l:minebound:myri/myri_corpse)my'ri corpses$() within, you'll be able to start crafting armor and spells.
